author: Staff Reporter
text:
A special seal has been introduced by the district administration to create awareness of voting in all the six Assembly constituencies in the district.

According to a statement issued by District Election Officer and Collector M. Ravikumar on Saturday, the seal contains words: ‘Hundred percent polling’; ‘Thoothukudi District’, and ‘May 16 –Day of Polling’.

This seal would be punched on all posts despatched from government offices from March 28, the statement added.
title: Special seal on voter awareness
